meetings.title: Sharp Security from All Angles
meetings.speaker: Tiffany Ford
meetings.description:
This workshop is a scaled-down version of the Secure From Scratch presentation I attended at Defcon 32 in August 2024. We will look at a .NET Core 8 / Angular 17 application and discuss security vulnerabilities, learn how attackers think about exploitation and how you can think securely about your applications.

Attendees who want to work along with me during the workshop will need to get the application running on their laptops before the session. Instructions available in the GitHub repository for the test application.
meetings.schedule:
6:00 PM - Pizza and Networking
6:30 PM - Workshop Begins

meetings.title: Catching up with Competitions
meetings.speaker: Various Student Presenters
meetings.description: OTC Students will be presenting on their experience at competitions such as CCDC & CCSC. There will be updates about any students who competed at SkillsUSA and are going on to nationals. There will also be a short pitch from Officer Candidates. More information coming soon.
meetings.schedule:
6:00 PM - Pizza and Networking
6:30 PM - Meeting Begins

meetings.title: End of Semester Party
meetings.speaker: Potluck + Games
meetings.description:
Join us for our end of semester party! Bring a dish to share and your favorite board game. Please note that pizza will not be provided, and no registration is required.

Additionally, we will be announcing the winners of the Officer elections. Don't forget to vote!

Note: Due to a class being held in PMC 232, we will be meeting in PMC 161.

meetings.title: Welcome Back Party
meetings.description:
Hey friends! We're getting 2Gether in PMC-232 at 5:00 PM on Wednesday, August 27th!

Whether you're new to Tech2Gether or a returning member, this is the perfect chance to:

✨ Meet other tech-minded students
✨ Learn about what we're planning for this semester
✨ Share your ideas + hang out
✨ See how you can contribute (we’re especially looking for folks to join the Website Team!)

No experience or RSVP needed - just bring yourself
Hope to see you there!

meetings.title: What you need to know from who you need to know: Industry Expert Panel
meetings.speaker: Ray Kreuger, Christa Williams, Nathan Dievert, Josh Dejeu, Audrey Harmon & Louis Lathrop
meetings.description:
Join us for an exciting panel of speakers from the IT Deparment at SRC Logistics, Inc. They will be sharing their insights on what you need to know to succeed in the tech industry. This is a great opportunity to learn from experienced professionals and get your questions answered.

Panelists:

Ray Kreuger - Director of Information Technology
Christa Williams - Project Manager
Nathan Dievert - Senior Software Engineer
Josh Dejeu - Software Engineer I (Internship Program)
Audrey Harmon - Software Engineer I
Louis Lathrop - Tech Support Analyst

Don't miss this opportunity to learn from the best in the business!
meetings.schedule:
5:00 PM - CIS/CSC talk starts
6:15 PM - Pizza and Networking
6:45 PM - ITI/CYB Talk Begins
8:00 PM - Meeting Ends

meetings.title: Flipping the Script: Stories & Skill-Building from Cybersecurity Conferences
meetings.speaker: Jennifer Collins
meetings.description: Come hear Jennifer Collins, an Ozarks Tech Alumni share her experiences from attending cybersecurity conferences and workshops. Jennifer can almost always be found hosting some career or skill building event and is a well known and beloved face in the Springfield tech community.
meetings.schedule:
5:00 PM - CIS/CSC talk starts
6:15 PM - Pizza and Networking
6:45 PM - ITI/CYB Talk Begins
8:00 PM - Meeting Ends

meetings.title: Scary-good Networking  (LinkedIn Workshop)
meetings.speaker: TBA
meetings.description:
Learn how to craft a LinkedIn profile so impressive it'll send shivers down your spine! Whether you're just getting started or already have a profile, you'll leave with tips and tricks to make your professional presence truly haunting! (in the best way)
We will also have a photographer on the scene to provide quality professional headshots for your new/improved profile!

meetings.title: Intro to Capture the Flag (CTF Workshop)
meetings.speaker: Jennifer Collins
meetings.description:
Put your Cybersecurity skills to the test! We'll be practicing PicoCTF challenges to help sharpen your skills and prepare you for Ozzy's Cyber Heist - our very own CTF - next April.

All skill levels are welcome!

Need a hand? Don't worry! We will be there to offer help and walkthroughs for challenges we've already solved, so you can learn how to approach them step by step!

So come for the pizza, stay for the networking, and leave with new knowledge that'll scare recruiters... in a good way!
meetings.schedule:
5:00 PM - LinkedIn Workshop Begins
6:15 PM - picoCTF Workshop Begins
7:15 PM - Meeting Ends
